description.author: Salesforce
text: A container component that provides a base structure for a popover with customizable header and footer sections.

elements.name: headerStartContent
elements.description: Represents the content of the slot for the starting part of the header.

elements.name: headerContent
elements.description: Represents the content of the main header slot.

elements.name: headerEndContent
elements.description: Represents the content of the slot for the ending part of the header.

elements.name: defaultSlotContent
elements.description: Represents the default slot content for the body of the popover.

elements.name: footerContent
elements.description: Represents the content of the footer slot.
